translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別に友達になったわけでもねぇ」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not like we became friends or anything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お、剣豪、飴ちゃんもらったのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, swordsman, did you get some candy?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今宵、死ぬには良い月夜だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tonight is a perfect moonlit night to die!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あうう、剣豪ちゃんかわいいなぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Auu, the swordsman-chan is so cute...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また撫で撫でさせて欲しいなぁ……」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to pet you again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばいばーい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bye-bye!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アパちゃんばいばーい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apa-chan, bye-bye!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……だから、アパちゃんと呼ぶなと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...That's why I told you not to call me Apa-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャハハ、また今度会ったら遊んであげる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kya ha ha, I'll play with you when we meet again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまで死なないようにね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until then, don't die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、ごはん、ごはんがー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, food, food is here—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がう！　ぐるるるるる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grr! Grrrrrrrr!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 興味深い話ばかりだったぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those were all very interesting stories.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またいずれ会おう。るろんたの王よ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's meet again someday, King of Ruronta.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……で、あるな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Indeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って、何を仲良くなっとるかお前らー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait, what are you guys getting along for?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では、本日はこれにて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, that'll be all for today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またお会いしましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's meet again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、次に会ったら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I told you, next time we meet—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブッ殺すと言っとるだろーが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —I'll kill you, didn't I say that?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学者は一礼し、部下を連れて去って行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scholar bowed politely and left with his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……敵ではありますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...They are enemies, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪い方々ではないようですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they don't seem to be bad people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ、こっちの方が悪者のような……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather, it feels like we might be the bad guys...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それもそうですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's true, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだと？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What did you say?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しっかし、意外だったぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, that was unexpected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学者が奴らに共闘を提案するなんてよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scholar proposing to cooperate with those guys?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そもそも信じていいかも微妙な連中と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With people you're not even sure if you can trust,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく休戦なんてする気になったな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you somehow decided to make a truce.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう、ですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, that's right...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か根拠があったんだろう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There must have been some reason for it, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教えろよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tell me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく、です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a feeling, really.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……こりゃあ、本当に驚いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...This really surprised me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学者の口からそんな言葉が出るとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought I'd hear such words from the scholar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私にだって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even I,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直感を信じる時くらいありますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have moments when I trust my intuition.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さて、そろそろ本格的に後がありませんね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, it seems we have no real options left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、上からはいつ倒すのかとせっつかれてる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, the higher-ups keep pushing when we'll defeat them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフが俺らを庇うのも限界だろう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff protecting us can't last forever...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次に彼らと会うときが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next time we meet them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達の決戦になりそうです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it looks like it'll be our final battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's far enough!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひゃっ！？　この声は！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hyah!? That voice!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無視無視、行くぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignore it, ignore it, let's go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは無視して前にズンズン進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance ignored it and kept marching forward steadily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そーこーまーでーだー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s far enough!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、あのー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, excuse me...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、呼ばれてますよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance-sama, someone is calling you...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はあ……どうせ、あいつらだろ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hah... It's probably those guys again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道を進んでいたランスの前にモンスターが現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A monster appeared in front of Lance as he walked down the path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊、参上！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maerita Squad, reporting in!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お久しぶりですね、カオスマスター。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Long time no see, Chaos Master.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、ランス殿……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, Lance-dono...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前ら、また来たのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You guys came again, huh?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばいばーい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bye-bye!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アパちゃんばいばーい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apa-chan, bye-bye!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……だから、アパちゃんと呼ぶなと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...That's why I told you not to call me Apa-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャハハ、また今度会ったら遊んであげる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kya ha ha, I'll play with you when we meet again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまで死なないようにね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until then, don't die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、ごはん、ごはんがー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, food, food is here—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がう！　ぐるるるるる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grr! Grrrrrrrr!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 興味深い話ばかりだったぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those were all very interesting stories.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またいずれ会おう。るろんたの王よ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's meet again someday, King of Ruronta.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……で、あるな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Indeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って、何を仲良くなっとるかお前らー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait, what are you guys getting along for?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では、本日はこれにて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, that'll be all for today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またお会いしましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's meet again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、次に会ったら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I told you, next time we meet—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブッ殺すと言っとるだろーが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —I'll kill you, didn't I say that?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学者は一礼し、部下を連れて去って行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scholar bowed politely and left with his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……敵ではありますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...They are enemies, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪い方々ではないようですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they don't seem to be bad people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ、こっちの方が悪者のような……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather, it feels like we might be the bad guys...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それもそうですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's true, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだと？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What did you say?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しっかし、意外だったぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, that was unexpected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学者が奴らに共闘を提案するなんてよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scholar proposing to cooperate with those guys?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そもそも信じていいかも微妙な連中と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With people you're not even sure if you can trust,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく休戦なんてする気になったな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you somehow decided to make a truce.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう、ですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, that's right...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か根拠があったんだろう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There must have been some reason for it, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教えろよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tell me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく、です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a feeling, really.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……こりゃあ、本当に驚いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...This really surprised me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学者の口からそんな言葉が出るとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought I'd hear such words from the scholar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私にだって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even I,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直感を信じる時くらいありますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have moments when I trust my intuition.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さて、そろそろ本格的に後がありませんね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, it seems we have no real options left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、上からはいつ倒すのかとせっつかれてる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, the higher-ups keep pushing when we'll defeat them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフが俺らを庇うのも限界だろう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff protecting us can't last forever...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次に彼らと会うときが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next time we meet them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達の決戦になりそうです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it looks like it'll be our final battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's far enough!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひゃっ！？　この声は！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hyah!? That voice!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無視無視、行くぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignore it, ignore it, let's go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは無視して前にズンズン進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance ignored it and kept marching forward steadily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そーこーまーでーだー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s far enough!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、あのー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, excuse me...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、呼ばれてますよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance-sama, someone is calling you...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はあ……どうせ、あいつらだろ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hah... It's probably those guys again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道を進んでいたランスの前にモンスターが現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A monster appeared in front of Lance as he walked down the path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊、参上！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maerita Squad, reporting in!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お久しぶりですね、カオスマスター。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Long time no see, Chaos Master.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、ランス殿……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, Lance-dono...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前ら、また来たのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You guys came again, huh?
